about.title: About
about.description1: DESIRE is a premium hotel-residential complex located in a new modern district at the heart of Antalya, one of the top 10 most visited cities in the world.
about.description2: The project is actively under construction, but there is still an opportunity to invest under attractive conditions!

advantages.investmentReturns: Investment returns – up to 35% per annum

investmentAttractiveArea.title: INVESTMENT-ATTRACTIVE AREA
investmentAttractiveArea.description: DESIRE is located near the airport in the modern and dynamic Altintash district, which is developing at a colossal pace! Business infrastructure, shopping malls, restaurants, and shops, places for leisure and children's education attract guests and residents from around the world.
investmentAttractiveArea.description2: The active development of the area increases its investment appeal, making it an excellent option that will quickly pay off and start generating income!

highLevelOfComfort.title: HIGH LEVEL OF COMFORT
highLevelOfComfort.description: Apartments with the service of a five-star hotel combine the feeling of home with a place where all your desires are impeccably met.
highLevelOfComfort.description2: Owners and residents have 24/7 access to the hotel's entire infrastructure – restaurants, wellness area, rooftop terraces, and relaxation patios.

investInApartments.title: INVEST IN APARTMENTS
investInApartments.description: Demand for real estate in Antalya is only growing, so the acquired residence or apartments will become a profitable project for resale or rental. With proximity to the sea, a warm climate, and developed infrastructure, you can attract tenants year-round.

desireInvestProgram.title: DESIRE INVEST PROGRAM
desireInvestProgram.description: The program offers investors a unique opportunity to purchase a share in hotel rooms, opening doors to high passive income.
desireInvestProgram.description2: The system offers two program options: 25% or 50% share in a room, providing flexibility and the ability to invest according to the client's financial goals. One of the key advantages is the ability to expand the investment portfolio without the need to invest the full amount.

fiveStarComplex.title: 5☆ COMPLEX AT A FAVORABLE PRICE
fiveStarComplex.description: A rich collection of layouts, large panoramic windows, meticulously thought-out interiors, and a variety of services create a unique space where residents with different lifestyles will feel comfortable.
fiveStarComplex.description2: There are only 73 apartments and 59 hotel rooms with business-class finishing in the complex!

apartments.soldOutMessage: Over 60% of the complex is sold!
apartments.HurryToBookMessage: Hurry to book the best apartments at construction prices
apartments.HurryToBookMessage2: and get your apartment or share in the hotel by the end of 2025!

partners.title: Development and Management
partners.subtitle: We have combined the efforts of three strong players to design and build your home quickly and efficiently, with 5-star service and exceptional management.
partners.teusGroupDescription: Teus Group — the general contractor responsible for organizing and implementing the entire construction process. Its organizational and management skills, experience, and expertise ensure high quality within defined timelines.
partners.zhytlobudDescription: Zhytlobud-2 — a full-cycle company with 80 years of market experience. Since 2000, it has built and commissioned over 1 million square meters of residential and commercial real estate.
partners.bestWesternDescription: The Desire project is part of the globally renowned Best Western hotel network, offering legendary service and high standards for residents and guests.
